NOVOPlasty
==========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which NOVOPlasty installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using NOVOPlasty, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load NOVOPlasty/3.7-GCCcore-8.3.0
```
